    <input name="uselang" type="hidden" value="en"/>
    <input name="searchproject" type="hidden" value="q"/>

     Find a language:
    </label>

   <ul>
    <li>
     <a href="//meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Wikiquote#List_of_Wikiquotes" lang="en">
      Other languages
     </a>
    </li>
   </ul>
  </div>
  <hr/>
